channel.title: Mopar for macs
channel.description: ok so i got mopar to work on my computer :D, and now i was wondering how to get to actually be abl to use my server. like instead of a batch file, what type of file do i have to use to be able to compile my server and play it. :confused:

item.title: Mopar for macs
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok so i switched my compiler to compiler.term, and this is whatâ€™s inside:

@echo off title ZymusScape Compiler /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/javac.exec -cp . *.java /System/Library/Frameworks/Java.VM.framework/Versions/1.5.0/Commands/java.exe server pause

and when i run it i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot [Process exited - exit code 1]

and this is the command i use:

java -cp MoparScape32.jar; Bot

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar for macs
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Same way. Just rename .bat to whatever MAC uses, and change the syntax to whatever MAC uses.
Google it.

Read full topic
